document_title: Ventricular tachycardia: Causes, symptoms, diagnosis, prevention
subsection_name: nhip-nhanh-that.json_10_Pay attention when you have ventricular tachycardia
subsection_content:
When diagnosed with ventricular tachycardia, you need to follow your doctor's treatment instructions as well as change your scientific diet, moderate lifestyle, etc. to improve your condition. Patients need to pay attention to scheduled medical appointments so that the doctor can check, adjust medications or intervene promptly.
To schedule an examination and treatment for Ventricular Tachycardia at the Cardiovascular Center, Tam Anh General Hospital System, please contact:
Ischemic heart disease (or coronary heart disease or coronary artery disease) is one of the risk factors for ventricular tachycardia. Therefore, patients need to proactively have regular health check-ups to detect diseases and treat them before they cause dangerous, life-threatening complications.
